item.description:
Vibram has some new digs. They've put together an awesome store on Newb'ry St. and want us, TMIRCE and the Informal Nation to come celebrate by going for a breakfast run.

This Sunday, July 29th at 9am; come ready to run and then munch on coffee/bagels/etc afterwards.

RSVP necessary and I can't even imagine why you wouldn't. 

This is a special event in addition to our normal Saturday Fun Run. 

From last weeks Boston Globe: 

Store Manager Tracy Weeks-Gariepy says, "I can't wait to go for a run with TMIRCE. I've been waiting my all winter to unlock the doors and start having some fun on Newbury St. If anyone knows how to rock, it's TMIRCE." 

WHERE IS IT?

Newbury St. Between Gloucester and Hereford St. It's so fresh and new the address isn't in google maps. Look for the Vibram flag on the left side heading towards Hereford. 

Please RSVP because we only have 20 bagels and a solo cup of coffee

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Vibram Store Fun Run
